title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 350.4 - APD advisory group
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 350.4 - APD advisory group

State Regulations
(a) The Department
may establish an advisory group to provide recommendations on any or all of the
following areas: submission specifications, patient privacy and
confidentiality, data release, data aggregation, and security. (b) The Department may accept, reject, or
amend recommendations, in whole or in part, from the advisory group. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
350.4

Adopted

New

York State Register September 13, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 37, eff. 9/13/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
